front.title: •Blizzard Scout 1
front.gametext: May add 1 pilot or passenger. May move as a 'react.' Power +1 at any Hoth site. Permanent pilot provides ability of 1.
front.lore: Enclosed All Terrain Scout Transport (AT-ST). Provides flanking support to the AT-ATs of Blizzard Force. Modified for cold weather combat.

combo: Blizzard Scout 1 + Admiral Motti + Snowtroopers (at other locations).
Blizzard Scout 1 + Trample Trample opponent's undercover spies.
